description: '''Scorn''' is an English [[electronic music]] project. The group was formed in the early 1990s as a project of former [[Napalm Death]] members [[Mick Harris]] and [[Nicholas Bullen|Nic Bullen]]. Bullen left the group in 1995, and the project continued on a solo project for Harris until 1997. Scorn was relaunched in 2000 and operated until the end of 2011. Harris restarted the project, once again, in 2019, but stopped it in late 2022.
